summary: Enables and disables the ability to pickup items and activate things via a simple spell with a menu.
descriptionHtml:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/b7O5gd7.png[/img][/url]

============================
| Player OCD Cure |
============================
Made By: UlithiumDragon

*DISCLAIMER*
I actually have OCD (Obsessive Compulsive Disorder) and am in no way using it as a joke. I made this
mod because I cannot seem to get through content very quickly because of my compulsive need to stop and pick up every item that's not nailed to the floor.
*END DISCLAIMER*

[img]http://i.imgur.com/sILLBsK.jpg[/img]

------------------------------
Uninstallation Note:

As this mod DOES include scripts (which get baked into save files), it is not advised or safe to
uninstall this mod in the middle of a playthrough. If you must uninstall it, I highly recommend reverting to a save
point from before you installed this mod.
------------------------------

The spell will be added to you list the first time you load up the game with this mod enabled. It is listed under
the lesser powers tab and is called "OCD Cure". You may enable and disable item picked and activation at will using this
spell, which opens a menu that lets you choose your option.

----------------------------------------------
In Case Of Unforeseen Errors:

If for some reason you cannot re-enable pickup and activation, open the console in-game with
the ` key (to the left of the non-numbpad 1) and type in "player.enableplayercontrols" without the quotes.
----------------------------------------------

*IMPORTANT NOTE*
It is important to note that anything that makes use of either the enableplayercontrols or disableplayercontrols commands
will reset the functionality of this mod (an example being shifting in and out of werewolf form). When this happens,
simply reset the system by first using the menu to select "Enable", then using it to select "Disable". this will ensure
that all the settings for the different kinds of player control flags are propperly set up for this mod.
*END IMPORTANT NOTE*

-----------
Credits:
-----------

Bethesda for Skyrim
My parents for my AMAZING genetics

-----------------
Final Notes:
------------------
I hope you enjoy this!

-UlithiumDragon
author: UlithiumDragon
